Name: The Adventures of Mr. Poop
About the game: Attention! Some people could have attacks under the influence of the flashing images, even, if they have never had a diagnosis «epilepsy». About: The year 2020 practically killed all of humanity, and we decided to finish it off in 2021 by releasing an addictive multi-level platformer, namely 'The Adventures of Mr. Poop', in which you have to overcome many challenges. Game Features: Not only the location will change from level to level, but also the gameplay itself. Get through the sewers, the sands of the Sahara, conquer Everest, and then fight back against the zombie horde. You will have to make choices, on which the fate of the protagonist will depend. Think about every step you take, because there is no turning back. Carefully explore the locations, so as not to miss a lot of hidden Easter eggs and secret levels!
